channel.title: Reflection on non applet clients
channel.description: Hey this seems like an active forum for java hacks and bots though specifically directed at runescape. My question is how would one go about hacking a java client and building a reflection client for it. The game is puzzle pirates and the client is a downloadable jar. how would i go about hacking it and building my own reflection client for the game?

item.title: Reflection on non applet clients
item.dc:creator: @Lurie1 Lurie1
